urls.title: Recycling collections ‚Äì Somerset Waste Partnership
urls.description: The standard recycling collection service for most households (excluding communal properties) is weekly for recycling and food waste. If your recycling collection has been missed you can report it online after 7pm on the due day and within three working days (not including the initial collection day itself). Recycling works ‚Äì Somerset Waste Partnership‚Äôs annual recycling register tells you exactly what has happened to every tonne of recycling you recycled ‚Äì where it went, what it became and how much it

text:
Global Commission on Adaptation Commissioner @EmmaHowardBoyd outlines the @EnvAgency new flood strategy that prepares #UK coastal communities for #climatechange.

It's just one example of a #ResilientRecovery. Learn more about last week's #AdaptationWeek: https://t.co/CCsFdfGTP4 https://t.co/l7AijaoqYv

As winter sets in the risk of flooding increases ‚Äì we have lots of helpful information and resources available at https://t.co/4vAaK423L2 
You can also sign up for free flood warning messages from @EnvAgency. #WinterinWyre https://t.co/iU5O7imXzk

@PTESOrchards @EnvAgency lots of orchards on that map too....not so many now.

The upper-left of the old map shows lots of boggy ground. If the @EnvAgency could direct land managers to this sort of evidence and insist that restoration of water retentive land is the solution to flooding - which it is - the Lugg situation may be avoided in the future https://t.co/43jApqiIu7

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.
